Description:
PRESENTATION + POSITION = PERFECT
With quiet residential surrounds and a stones throw away to Craigieburns major amenities, this generously proportioned renovated home offers convenient and care-free living, an ideal opportunity for first-time home buyers, downsizers and investors to capture a home that exudes the best in style and practicality.
The deceiving floor plan is a pleasant surprise with the huge open plan lounge, dining and kitchen area being the heart of the home. Equipped with a charming exposed brick wall this impressive and spacious zone is complimented by sliding stacker doors leading to an intimate courtyard with eco decking, the ideal outdoor entertaining haven. This home includes three bedrooms with built-in robes, separate laundry, central bathroom with tub, split system heating/cooling, new ducted heating system with 7 year warranty, solar panels, intercom and single car garage with drive through access to a carport.
Located minutes walk to medical centres, Craigieburn Plaza, and public transport, i.e. Craigieburn train station, and local bus service, reserves, and an impressive selection of schools. This quality property offers an enriching and convenient suburban lifestyle in an established and much-loved locale.
*We have obtained all information in this document from sources we believe to be reliable; however, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective buyers are advised to carry out their own investigations.*

Description:
Quality Build 4 Bedroom Family Home
Located in the vibrant new Annadale Estate amongst an impressive standard of new homes and local parklands, rests a low maintenance home perfect for first home buyers and investors.
The functional floor plan provides loads of room for the growing family, with four spacious bedrooms and two living areas. The main bedroom includes en-suite, a large bathroom with bathtub, a stunning kitchen equipped with s/s appliances, dishwasher and with lot of storage space, all overlooking a large dining and living plus landscaped gardens and a lovely outdoor area with alfresco in the back.
Other features include: refrigerated cooling and heating , quality flooring, down lights, window furnishings, a large separate laundry with outdoor access and 2 car remote lock up garage with external and internal access.
Perfect for the first home buyer, growing family or astute investor. Don't let opportunity pass you by! Call now to arrange inspection.
Landscaping For Illustrative Purposes Only

Description:
THE PRESTIGE
With phenomenal street appeal and perfectly Located in a highly sought pocket of Roxburgh Park It's a true rarity when you find the home of your dreams, where you can turn the key, and move right in.
From the moment you step up to the walkway to enter, you are greeted with a friendly, safe, and homely feel, set in an established street near a host of amenities.
This stunning 32 square, family home offers 5 great size bedrooms, Master suite features walk in robe and en-suite, and built in robes in other bedrooms.
Showcasing a huge open plan family and meals area, quality gourmet kitchen, quality stainless steel appliances and including dishwasher, ample cupboard space and a double pantry, massive rear rumpus room, outdoor entertaining with cafe blinds.
The rear yard is spacious enough for the kids to roam free. This family abode is superb in every way and is perfect for both indoor and outdoor entertaining.
Other features include ducted heating, Evap cooling, ducted vacuum, Double driveway leading to the oversize double lock up garage on remote with internal and drive through access and positioned perfectly within proximity to all key amenities such as transport, shops, schooling and medical centers.
*Harcourts Roxburgh Park Coronavirus Update*
In light of recent events, Harcourts Roxburgh Park have taken the appropriate measures to minimise the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak to our staff, clients and customers. As news concerning the spread of coronavirus continues to unfold, we are no longer conducting open for inspections and kindly ask that you DO NOT attend inspections, if:
* You are feeling unwell
* Have been in contact with someone diagnosed with coronavirus
* Have been in contact with someone who has recently been overseas
* You are under strict self-isolation instructions
* You have tested positive to coronavirus yourself
If attending inspections, please ensure you practice Social Distancing (minimum 1.5 metres) at all times, keeping in mind:
* Our agents will restrict the number of people inspecting the property to one person at any time.
* You refrain from touching surfaces, door handles, cupboards, drawers, walls, etc. when inspecting the property.
We appreciate your co-operation and ask that you please respect the advice and recommendations of the agent when inspecting the property.

Description:
Great location in Beverdige, Mandalay
Offered for sale this delightful 476m2 allotment in prestigious Mandalay Estate provides the ideal blend of metropolitan living with sweeping landscapes. With a 14m frontage, this allotment will accommodate your first home. Be part of Mandalay Club House complete with gym, pool & restaurant. Jump on the freeway and within 40 minutes be in the city for work or play. Titled and ready to build this sought-after property is waiting for you.
Please come and see me at one of our offices below to discuss your real estate needs.

Description:
Proudly Presented With a Location to Match...
From the moment you step inside you will be impressed with the quality & style that this family home has to offer. With a vibrant, charismatic personality & cleverly designed home which delivers easy, practical & flexible living for all.
Beyond its striking facade, the home's beautifully-appointed interior boasts a large master bedroom fitted with walk in robe and ensuite, three additional large bedrooms, main bathroom and the perfect family room.
Other luxuries include kitchen with stainless steel appliances looking over the meals area, ducted heating, split system cooling, double car garage with internal access, immaculately landscaped front and rear gardens plus patio area.
An aspirational family lifestyle located in one of Craigieburn's Malcolm Creek Estate & premium streets amongst quality homes & parkland. With all amenities close by including Craigieburn Central, Stockland shopping centre, public transport and local schools.

Fully-Titled Corner Block in the Heart of Donnybrook!
This sensational 496m2 approx allotment is ready & waiting for you to build your dream home with all the bonuses that the Kinbrook Estate has to offer.
With park frontage, you & your family can explore the winding Merri Creek trail on your bike, make the most of Laffan Reserve and sporting grounds.
With easy access to Hume Freeway and only moments away from the Donnybrook train station taking you into Melbourne's CBD jump on this opportunity to secure your family's future in this fast-growing estate.

Description:
BRAND NEW BURSTING WITH QUALITY
In a thriving Mickleham neighborhood, this brand new full-turn key home is one that will ignite your excitement. Fabulous decor, a charming colour palette & functional floor plan complements an attractive facade & manicured low-maintenance gardens.
Designed for easy living this low maintenance residence boasts comfort & style that will delight the most fastidious home buyer or investor.
It's smartly configured floor plan comprises a study/second lounge, a fully equipped stone top kitchen that adjoins spacious open plan meals area which effortlessly links outside to reveal a low maintenance sunny courtyard, fully concreted for convenience. Sleeping quarters including 3 good sized bedrooms all with walk-in robes, master with walk-in robe & ensuite, sparkling central bathroom with freestanding tub & separate toilet/powder room.
Further features include a family sized laundry, a single garage, ducted heating, powerful split-system cooling, blinds throughout, high ceilings & doors & so much more!
Walking distance to parkland & playground, it's also close to childcare facilities & local community centre, easy access to Craigieburn, as well as schools, shops & public transport.

Description:
One of Roxburgh Parks Finest Location
Capital & Co Real Estate is proud to present 10 Salween Cres, Roxburgh Park.
INSPECTION BY APPOINTMENT ONLY.
This stunning family home packed full of character and charm will provide your family with great comfort and an abundance of convenience.
Ideally positioned on a generous allotment in a quiet Street. The internal layout is extremely versatile and boasts two living zones, three bedrooms (master with en-suite and walk in robe), two bedrooms feature built in robes. A generously sized kitchen with no shortage of cupboard space.
The home features a car garage with a drive thru access where multiple cars can be parked. This home is blessed with pergolas that can be used for entertaining areas, storing vehicles, jet skis and many more other things can be stored and secured with the shed also available. The home comes with plenty of additional features to love such as ducted heating, evaporative cooling, stainless steel appliances and many more to be seen.
***PHOTO IDENTIFICATION IS REQUIRED FOR ALL INSPECTIONS***
Disclaimer: Every precaution has been taken to establish the accuracy of the above information, but it does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.

Description:
BRAND NEW HOME WITH 3 LIVING AREAS!!!
A beautiful Brand New 4 Bedroom house in the heart of Craigieburn. Location doesn't get any better than this, with schools, Shopping Centre, parks and public transport just a short stroll away.
A fantastic opportunity to purchase this brand-new establishment designed to accommodate both a growing family and first home buyers. This magnificent home boasting four large bedrooms with the master comprising his and her WIR's and ensuite with double vanity, spacious living and separate dining area. Fabulous kitchen featuring 900mm appliances, plumbing point for refrigerator, 40mm stone bench tops, dishwasher & a walk-in-pantry.
Other features include :- Theatre room, Formal lounge, alfresco, fully tiled bathrooms, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, high 2.7m ceilings, alarm system, video intercom, LED downlights, floating floorboards, double remote garage with internal and external access, exposed aggregate driveways, fully upgraded higher facade, concrete around the house, fully landscaped with full perimeter fencing.

Offering a perfect balance of space, style and convenience, this radiant two-bedroom appartment delivers smart low maintenance living with swift access to key lifestyle assets. This impressive residence features a light and bright open-plan living area, where a central modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances is flanked by an inviting living space and sun-kissed dining area, which integrates with the private and oversized balcony with ample room for entertaining.

Description:
BEAUTY IN THE MAKING
A fantastic opportunity to buy this magnificent off the plan 4 Bedroom house in the heart of Craigieburn. With estimated completion by June 2020, save $$$ on stamp duty or make numerous choices at no extra cost. Location doesn't get any better than this, with schools, Shopping Centre, parks and public transport just a short stroll away. Set on the prestigious Highlander Drive, this floorplan is skillfully designed to maximise utility.
With 4 generous sized bedrooms (master with full ensuite and WIR and remaining 3 bedrooms with BIR's), multiple lounges as well as a dedicated study room, this house will tick most of your boxes. When it comes to space it caters to all large and growing families with an open plan living area and a great sized kitchen with ample cupboard space and stainless-steel appliances.
An abundance of light, luxury and living space defines this exceptional family home situated in a privileged position, only minutes from Craigieburn Central and beautiful parklands.
This home is designed to accommodate both growing family and first home buyers.
Features:
2.7m ceilings
LED Downlights
Cooling
Ducted Heating
40mm stone bench top in kitchen
900 stainless steel appliances
Window furnishings
wrapped around fencing
Hot water system
Concrete driveway
& many more. Be early to give it your own touch of colours/ layout (STA)
Photos For Illustrative Purposes Only
More New Homes and House & Land Packages are available in Wollert, Craigieburn, Mickleham, Mernda and Kalkallo.
CALL NOW TO INSPECT!

Description:
Spacious & Elegant Family Living on 740 Sqm Approx.
A sophisticated free flowing design exists throughout this large single level family home offering a contemporary decor boasting both character and finesse. From the moment you step inside you will appreciate the flexible floor plan that allows the family to interact yet provides space for those who appreciate their privacy. Comprising of ducted heating, evaporative cooling & split system cooling, rumpus/theatre room, oversized study with walk in robe or optional 4th bedroom, kitchen featuring stainless steel appliances, wall oven, dishwasher, HUGE walk in pantry & meals area with adjoining family room, great size bedrooms all with built in robes & master bedroom with full ensuite containing a double shower and walk in robe.
Extra features include ducted vaccum, alarm system, in-built dryer closet, water temperature controller, triple remote control garage with internal access, large storage room & drive thru access, quality blinds throughout and timber bi fold doors leading you to the impressive split level timber decked OVERSIZED covered alfresco area with in built BBQ, sink & cafe blinds perfect for entertaining all year round. All set on a large allotment this home really is a must see. Ideally located in the ever so popular Fairways Village Estate among quality homes and parkland. Be quick to inspect as this one won't hang around for long.

Description:
Olivine by Mirvac: Breathtaking single level family living
Have you ever dreamt of a family lifestyle set in a peaceful and picturesque estate that offers you access to an abundance of wonderful amenities and attractions? If so, your search is over with this spacious, stylish, and light-filled 4 bedroom 2 bathroom brand new family home in the exclusive Olivine by Mirvac estate.
Incredible central family and meals zone is saturated in natural light and promises amazing space!
Formal lounge room makes a cosy and private entertainment zone
Stone kitchen offers striking timber detail along with stainless steel appliances and a walk-in pantry
Generous master bedroom with walk-in robe storage and designer ensuite with elegant tiling and rain shower
Other bedrooms with mirrored BIRs
Sleek main bathroom, separate laundry
Ducted heating, evaporative cooling
Wide timber floors
Covered alfresco meals zone and low-maintenance garden
Double remote garage
AMENITIES
Olivine by Mirvac offers an array of fantastic amenities including 22 hectares of active open space, Gumnut Park and Adventure Playground (opening mid 2020), proposed Olivine Town Centre which will have fantastic retail outlets, and the relaxed The Shared Cup Cafe.
LOCATION
This amazing Donnybrook location has you close to Hume Anglican Grammar School, future Hayes Hill Primary School and child care, Highlands Shopping Centre, Craigieburn Plaza Shopping Centre, Donnybrook Reserve, Growling Frog Golf Course, Donnybrook Station, and easy access to the Hume Freeway.

Description:
Create Your Own Future in Merrifield
The dream begins here! Fully-titled, this generous allotment provides the perfect place to build your brand-new home with its uniform proportions, minimal gradient & prime location in the incredibly popular Merrifield Estate.
Approximately 350sqm in total (12.5m frontage x 28m depth), the block provides all the space needed for you to bring to reality the design of your dreams.
Close proximity to all the area's current & future master plan facilities including expansive parklands, Pinnacle park & sports facilities, primary & secondary schools, vibrant retail & dining precincts, along with easy access to Donnybrook Station & the Hume Freeway. A terrific starting point or astute investment opportunity around 20 minutes' drive to Melbourne Airport & 40 minutes to the CBD!

Description:
IMMACULATE RESIDENCE WITH 4 LIVING ZONES
This beautifully presented home offers a blend of space & style all in one amazing package that your family will enjoy for many years to come. Located in the prestigious Mt. Aitken estate, living here will make coming home an absolute pleasure. Cleverly zoned for large scale gatherings, the home comprises 4 large bedrooms (2 with walk in robes & 2 with built in robes), very spacious ensuite & walk in robe to main, large upstairs retreat, formal lounge room, fully equipped kitchen with stainless steel appliances, dishwasher & walk in pantry, oversized main bathroom, a spacious meals area and family room as well as separate theatre room or optional 5th bedroom. Outside you will find a large decked alfresco overlooking a generous yard with manicured gardens ideal for the kids. All this and conveniently located close to bus stops, local schools & shops, parkland and so much more.

Description:
Ticks All The boxes...
Located within one of the best family friendly pockets in Roxburgh Park. Just walking distance to Woolworths, Roxburgh Rise Primary School.
Short drive to Craigieburn Central and Roxburgh Park Shopping Centre, this well-appointed family home is set on a beautiful allotment of approximately 600m2, providing the perfect package for a growing family.
This substantial home has everything your family needs with multiple living spaces, generous open plan family/meals area serviced by a timeless kitchen and stainless- steel appliances. Containing 4 large bedrooms with a spacious master bedroom complemented by walk in robes and ensuite.
With extra features including: alarm system, Evaporative cooling/ ducted heating, double garage with drive through access to the backyard/entertainment space, low-maintenance gardens and shed.
This is quite simply THE ONE that you have been looking for. Please feel free to contact Nada Hanna on 0404 804 542
Photo ID required for an Inspection.
*Harcourts Roxburgh Park Coronavirus Update*
In light of recent events, Harcourts Roxburgh Park have taken the appropriate measures to minimise the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak to our staff, clients and customers. As news concerning the spread of coronavirus continues to unfold, we are no longer conducting open for inspections and kindly ask that you DO NOT attend inspections, if:
* You are feeling unwell
* Have been in contact with someone diagnosed with coronavirus
* Have been in contact with someone who has recently been overseas
* You are under strict self-isolation instructions
* You have tested positive to coronavirus yourself
If attending inspections, please ensure you practice Social Distancing (minimum 1.5 metres) at all times, keeping in mind:
* Our agents will restrict the number of people inspecting the property to one person at any time.
* You refrain from touching surfaces, door handles, cupboards, drawers, walls, etc. when inspecting the property.
We appreciate your co-operation and ask that you please respect the advice and recommendations of the agent when inspecting the property.

Description:
Potential, Position & Perfectly Priced!!!
If you are looking at purchasing a property for a bargain price and adding your tender, love and care than this one is for you!!! Set on a large allotment of approximately 539sqm and situated in a Roxburgh Park's popular Woodland estate with close proximity to all your key amenities, local schools, shopping centres, medical centres and transport.
Featuring a family friendly floor-plan this brick veneer home comprises of 4 bedrooms master bedroom including a walk in robe and en-suite, additional 3 bedrooms have built in robes and serviced by the central bathroom and separate toilet. Offering you the space for the family with two separate living areas, open plan kitchen with ample bench space and cupboard storage. Moving outside we are greeted with an outdoor entertainers delight and an extensive yard for the kids to play or even install that outdoor pool you desire.
Extras include single lock up garage with drive through access to the rear, ducted heating, reverse cycle air conditioner, down-lights, garden shed and much more.
Contact Lem Djemal on 0427 579 365 to register your interest and avoid missing out.
*Harcourts Roxburgh Park Coronavirus Update*
In light of recent events, Harcourts Roxburgh Park have taken the appropriate measures to minimise the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak to our staff, clients and customers. As news concerning the spread of coronavirus continues to unfold, we are no longer conducting open for inspections and kindly ask that you DO NOT attend inspections, if:
* You are feeling unwell
* Have been in contact with someone diagnosed with coronavirus
* Have been in contact with someone who has recently been overseas
* You are under strict self-isolation instructions
* You have tested positive to coronavirus yourself
If attending inspections, please ensure you practice Social Distancing (minimum 1.5 metres) at all times, keeping in mind:
* Our agents will restrict the number of people inspecting the property to one person at any time.
* You refrain from touching surfaces, door handles, cupboards, drawers, walls, etc. when inspecting the property.
We appreciate your co-operation and ask that you please respect the advice and recommendations of the agent when inspecting the property.

Description:
Brand New Delight!
Designed for easy living in a great location is this low maintenance residence which boasts comfort & style that will delight all home buyers.
This fantastic low maintenance Henley Home is ideal for all, with its spacious floorplan, designer flair & unbeatable location, this beautiful home showcases an abundance of natural light that includes an open plan meals/living area with a brilliantly well-appointed kitchen with stainless steel appliances, 900mm oven and stone benchtops.
On offer are 3 great sized bedrooms, featuring master with walk in robe & ensuite, plus a modern central bathroom. Luxuries include ducted heating, double remote contract garage with internal access and so much more. Inspections will not disappoint!
Disclaimer: Every precaution has been taken to establish the accuracy of this information, but it does not constitute any representation by vendor or agent.

Description:
The Ideal Family Home - In a great Location!
Combining comfort and convenience, this spacious family home is packed with potential! Everything is covered, from the sought-after location to the expansive yard and bright rooms, it's all here. All you need to do is move straight in!
From the moment you enter this neat, single-storey residence, you'll be impressed by the functional layout and clever use of space. The large living/dining area will immediately capture your attention with its huge windows that perfectly illuminate the room. Set on a 448m2 block, there's ample outside space to enjoy and explore.
Features Include
- 4 Spacious Bedrooms all with Built In Robes
- Master Bedroom with Ensuite
- Stainless Steel Appliances in Kitchen
- 90mm Gas Cooktop
- Central Bathroom
- Ducted Heating
- Double Garage
- Outdoor Decking
- Close to Schools, Shops, Parks, Bus Transport
If you love entertaining and want an easy to move into home that's been cherished for years, then this is the home for you.
